title: Chapter 6
content: This was about the 21st of February, 1885. Note added Sept. 10, 1885, 250,000 sets--500,000 single copies--have been sold to date--and only half the ground canvassed.

book.title: The Autobiography of Mark Twain
book.description: 简介： In this Autobiography I shall keep in mind the fact that I am speaking from the grave. I am literally speaking from the grave, because I shall be dead when the book issues from the press.I speak from the grave rather than with my living...
